EmailTemplate.name: Transaction Special Pricing Case Creation
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} for Transactional Pricing has been created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Date: {!Case.Today_Date__c} Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Inquiry Confirmation Information Only – No action required
Dear Sender,
We have received your inquiry: {!Case.Subject}. We are processing your request.
If there are no issues with the uploaded templates, you will have a SAP contract number provided in 2 business days.
• Please reference this case tracking number in any future correspondence: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
We will be in touch with you for any questions or clarifications needed.
Thank you,
Honeywell Aerospace Contract Administration Team
